text: Star Kabab is a kabab restaurant chain located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It has 11 branches in Dhaka. In 2015 it won the best Bangladeshi restaurant award in The Daily Star Foodiez choice awards.http://epaper.prothom- alo.com/view/dhaka/2016-09-09/24 ==History== ==Controversy== In 2016 the chain was fined 46 million taka by the VAT Intelligence Directorate for tax evasion. ==See also== *Madhur Canteen *Haji Biriyani ==References== ==External links== * Category:Dhaka Category:Restaurants in Dhaka Category:Bangladeshi cuisine
title: Star Kabab
